items.sentence: Let's try staying focused on the problem at hand.
Let's stop speaking French and switch to English.
Let's not pitch the tent right next to the river.
Law-abiding citizens have nothing to worry about.
I have to make enough money to support my family.
Those are questions that you should ask yourself.
You're the only person I've ever wanted to marry.
I did that because I wanted to be like my father.
I'm surprised that Tom refused such a good offer.
That isn't possible right now. Please wait a bit.
Why do you think that I'd do something like that?
Did you think that that was what I wanted to buy?
I think that that's the guy who told me to leave.
Do you still think that that's all we need to do?
I think that I mistakenly sent that email to Tom.
I just found out that Tom is Mary's ex-boyfriend.
Do you have any unexplained bruising or bleeding?
I've been thinking about starting a new business.
I thought that you'd finished doing that already.
Tom has a meeting with the boss tomorrow morning.
Tom took his shirt off and threw it on the floor.
I think my daughter's coming down with something.
Does anyone know of any remedies that could help?
I think that it was Tom who told Mary to do that.
Don't you think that it would be safe to do that?
What was I thinking when I said that I'd do that?
I don't think that I'm healthy enough to do that.
Do you think that doing that is going to be easy?
Don't you think that we convinced Tom to do that?
It seems Tom actually thinks that he can do that.
I think it's highly unlikely Tom will go bowling.
Do you think that Tom taught Mary how to do that?
Tom spent the whole morning looking for his keys.
Tom's proposal is completely out of the question.
Aren't you going to introduce me to your friends?
Can I get your attention for a couple of seconds?
If anybody calls, tell them I'll be back at 2:30.
Please come back in thirty minutes to pick it up.
Tom and John are both in love with the same girl.
If you hadn't had my advice, you would've failed.
It was below freezing this morning when I got up.
I think that I'm going to be doing that tomorrow.
Tom washed all the laundry and hung it up to dry.
By the time I arrived, everyone had already left.
We're going to try to make it as fun as possible.
Maybe you should try actually doing it this time.
Tom promised Mary that he'd try doing that again.
I wonder why Tom wasn't at the meeting yesterday.
There were muddy footprints on the kitchen floor.
A few students were late for school this morning.
